nodes.text: Mol Hedron was a Human Imperial spy from Swarquen. Serving the Galactic Empire for many years before the Battle of Yavin, he went to ground after Emperor Palpatine's death at the Battle of Endor. He later reappeared on Sluis Van stealing information regarding the New Republic starships being built there. Eluding capture, he was able to transmit the information he gained to the Imperial Remnant.
